version_description: Great news! Banana and coconut islands were discovered! It is time to equip the expedition because you will need exotic ingredients to prepare new goods and complete profitable orders.

Did you dream of breeding fish? We have good news! Repair the house on the lake and you will have the opportunity to get new products for cooking delicacies. Even more profitable orders are waiting for you!

Cutting down the trees at your location is a very important thing. And now you can make quite a good profit from it! Besides selling wood at a good price, you can use it to fill some profitable orders.

Cutting down the trees at your location is a very important thing. And now you can make quite a good profit from it! Besides selling wood at a good price, you can use it to fill some profitable orders.

Cutting down the trees at your location is a very important thing. And now you can make quite a good profit from it! Besides selling wood at a good price, you can use it to fill some profitable orders.
Great news! Businessman Tom has a great deal! For several days, cafes on wheels will offer delicious food to adults and children. Help Tom to prepare for the festival and get valuable prizes!

We are delighted to present you new special offers! You can now purchase crystals and receive an additional bonus for your new orders. Do not forget to come by every day and check on the daily discounts! Each of them is unique and available for a limited time!

Dear friends! We have a great new opportunity for you to earn more by building your own theme park! Don't miss out on the new season at Farmer Pass,  where you can complete daily jobs for tokens and gather new —Åollection items to restore fairground attractions!
The new season of Farmer Pass is now available! Complete daily tasks to collect precious rewards, and continue building your own amusement park!

The traditional holiday of deliciousness and fun, the Strawberry Festival, will begin in a few days. Don't shy away from trying something new, take part in this grand event, complete merchant Tom's assignments and get your well-deserved reward!
The new season of Farmer Pass is now available! Complete daily tasks to collect precious rewards, and continue building your own amusement park!

Travel back in time to the Jurassic period, to the world of dinosaurs, in the new season of Farmer Pass! Unlock treasure chests, collections and unique decor, and build a new fairground attraction for your amusement park!

Continue your adventure as a time traveler in the next season of Farmer Pass! Set out on a crusade as a knight and retrieve the missing items to build a new fairground attraction, receive unique decor and more valuable gains.

Cowboys. Indians. Crazy rodeos... Travel back in time and experience life in the Wild West in the new season of Farmer Pass. Complete special tasks for tokens, and you will be rewarded with valuable prizes, unique decor and collector's items so that you can build your amusement park!

Cowboys. Indians. Crazy rodeos... Travel back in time and experience life in the Wild West in the new season of Farmer Pass. Complete special tasks for tokens, and you will be rewarded with valuable prizes, unique decor and collector's items so that you can build your amusement park!

Dear fellows! Farm life became more exciting! Insects may attack your animals in the corral, fire may break out on factories, and fields may be attacked by locusts! Get rid of insects, put out a fire and receive your unique reward!

Dear fellows! Farm life became more exciting! Insects may attack your animals in the corral, fire may break out on factories, and fields may be attacked by locusts! Get rid of insects, put out a fire and receive your unique reward!

Halloween is coming soon. Celebrate the holiday and ensure capital gains by completing the orders of businessman Tom. A unique contract brings a unique reward. Fulfill the orders and open the chests with prizes!

The grandiose Waterslide Ride is already available for construction! Perform special tasks using tokens, get well-deserved awards and continue to equip the amusement park in the new Farmer Pass season!

Dear friends! You now have a great chance to increase crop yields, receive extra pens for livestock, speed up production, and receive many more bonuses! Build the Academy on your plot of land, and start researching to develop new technologies!

The rat is the symbol of 2020! This practical and cunning little critter knows plenty of life hacks.
You have a unique opportunity to give this wonderful pet a new home on your farm! Visit the Mysterious Island, find where the treasure is hidden, and you will receive this cute little pet as a reward!

The rat is the symbol of 2020! This practical and cunning little critter knows plenty of life hacks. You have a unique opportunity to give this wonderful pet a new home on your farm!  Visit the Mysterious Island, find where the treasure is hidden, and you will receive this cute little pet as a reward!

The rat is the symbol of 2020! This practical and cunning little critter knows plenty of life hacks. You have a unique opportunity to give this wonderful pet a new home on your farm!  Visit the Mysterious Island, find where the treasure is hidden, and you will receive this cute little pet as a reward!

Snow Valley season is here! Take it easy and complete tasks at your own relaxed pace. This week your neighborhood can take a break from battling it out for first place! Complete tasks to help the animals in Snow Valley and earn valuable prizes!
The treasure is hidden on the Mysterious Island. Equip your team for expedition and go find it!

There is so much green all around us and we've only just remembered that Saint Patrick's day is right around the corner! And so what can you do but get dressed up in a festive costume and set off in search of pots of gold! And if you help the magic leprechaun you can win some great prizes!
A new island to celebrate the Easter week. Rabbit Farm, Easter Baskets and of course Rabbits! Don‚Äôt miss your chance to take part and earn rewards.

Legends say that one can find rare treasures hidden deep in the sea waters. Take part in a sailing race, compete with other participants. The underwater world holds many adventures and valuable rewards!

Legends say that one can find rare treasures hidden deep in the sea waters. Take part in a sailing race, compete with other participants. The underwater world holds many adventures and valuable rewards!

Legends say that one can find rare treasures hidden deep in the sea waters. Take part in a sailing race, compete with other participants. The underwater world holds many adventures and valuable rewards!

Are they indeed real dinosaurs? Only here you have a unique opportunity to meet real dinosaurs, herbivores and predators, and even the most famous prehistoric predator. And you‚Äôll receive valuable rewards for the missions completed.

Set off towards The Mysterious Forest - a place inhabited by fairy trolls. Very dense thickets have sprung up in the forest and the trolls need your help. As a reward for helping them, you can earn valuable prizes.

Set off towards The Mysterious Forest - a place inhabited by fairy trolls. Very dense thickets have sprung up in the forest and the trolls need your help. As a reward for helping them, you can earn valuable prizes.

Yo-ho-ho! Hurry up to the pirate island to find the treasure, visit a real pirate ship and meet its captain! Here you will have real adventures that you may have heard of before, but now it‚Äôs time to take part!

Yo-ho-ho! Hurry up to the pirate island to find the treasure, visit a real pirate ship and meet its captain! Here you will have real adventures that you may have heard of before, but now it‚Äôs time to take part!
In the mysterious Dracula manor, everyone is preparing for the holiday. There is  a lot left to do, Dracula won't finish in time. Help the Count get ready and win valuable prizes.

The real Santa Claus has arrived at the farm, and wants to please you with awesome presents. But for the holiday to be a success, he will need your help. Take part in the New Year's adventures and get cool prizes!

There is so much green all around us and we've only just remembered that Saint Patrick's day is right around the corner! And so what can you do but get dressed up in a festive costume and set off in search of pots of gold! And if you help the magic leprechaun you can win some great prizes!
The game has a new production facility! Cute hedgehogs are ready to help gather the harvest. Set up mushroom-laden clearnings and a hedgehog house to provide the farm with fresh and tasty mushrooms.
The game has a new production facility! Cute hedgehogs are ready to help gather the harvest. Set up mushroom-laden clearnings and a hedgehog house to provide the farm with fresh and tasty mushrooms.

A unique place called Flower Valley is striking in its beauty. Luxurious, icy gladioluses and quivering blossoms of delicate lavender are an incredible combination for a stunning bouquet. I wonder if anyone has the courage to start their own flower production facility?
